## ModManager.checkMods() method

Check mod dependencies. You should warn your users that the result is not always correct.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
checkMods(): Promise<ModLoadingIssue[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ModLoadingIssue\[\]&gt;

All mod loading issues.
